string.text: You fight valiantly, but as the battle concludes you find yourself surrounded. You do your best to hold your enemies at bay, but as they close in one of them knocks your weapon to the ground, and another grabs your arms, shackling them behind you.
What will happen to you now?
Your enemies take your weapons and armor as you surrender. Their leader briefly gropes your breast and buttocks, nodding approvingly as you are rounded up with the rest of the captives.
What will happen to you now?

Your attempt to infiltrate the castle fails spectacularly, and you are quickly surrounded by guards. They take your weapons, dragging you to the dungeons where they throw you into a cell, commenting that their leader will certainly enjoy such a fiery guest.
Hope it doesn't come to that.

You are stripped of your clothing and weapons, your supple breasts and pert buttocks on display for every horny man in camp. You suspect you'll be the star in more than one man's nighttime fantasies...

You are stripped of your clothing and weapons, your supple breasts and pert buttocks on display for every horny man in town. You suspect you'll be the star in more than one man's nighttime fantasies...

You are stripped of your clothing and weapons, your supple breasts and pert buttocks on display for every horny man in the village. You suspect you'll be the star in more than one man's nighttime fantasies...

You're spotted as you attempt to escape, and a group of your captors shove you to the ground, binding your wrists with ropes to prevent any further resistance. Seeing you so helpless, they decide to reward themselves for their vigilance with your body. Your rags are stripped from your body and each of them takes you in turn, forcing their rods into your unwilling cleft, mouth, and ass with force and enthusiasm.
Maybe that wasn't a great idea...

You're almost spotted by a group of unusually wary guards as you escape, but manage to give them the slip by throwing a rock in the other direction as you scurry away. You don't allow yourself to relax until you're quite a ways from them, but the feeling of relief when you're finally sure you're free is overwhelming and very, very welcome.
